tool_description: Instagram Scraper is an api created from the real need to capture data in real time from Instagram, after a lot of searching, testing and learning, we created this API that makes use of Residential and 4G IPs to capture data in real time.  SDK's: PHP: https://github.com/angeljunior/instagram-scraper/
name: Instagram Scraper
title: Instagram Scraper

api_list.name: searchUsers
api_list.description: Return a list of users based on the query.

api_list.name: searchHashtags
api_list.description: Return a list de tags based on the query.

api_list.name: searchLocations
api_list.description: Return a list of locations based on query.

api_list.name: getMediasByLocation
api_list.description: Return last 50 medias use a location.

required_parameters.name: facebook_place_id
required_parameters.description: Use getLocationSearch to identify a **Facebook Place Id** if you don't have.

api_list.name: getMediasByHashtag
api_list.description: Return last 65 medias use a hashtag.

api_list.name: getMediaByURL
api_list.description: Returns all public data for a media by URL.

api_list.name: getMediaByCode
api_list.description: Returns all public data for a media by shortcode.

api_list.name: getMedias
api_list.description: Returns the list of posts for a profile in list.

api_list.name: getProfileByURL
api_list.description: Returns general public information about a profile by url.

api_list.name: getProfileByUsername
api_list.description: Returns general public information about a profile.
